name: The end of the art as we know it
name_original: The end of the art as we know it
description:
This game was made for the Ludum Dare 52: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/52/the-end-of-the-art-as-we-know-it

Under this very clever title, hides a controversial topic. Is AI better than Humans to make Art?

You, the player, will help humanity by proving that humans are the best. To do so, you will have to help the Human artist produce a beautiful piece of art, all the while SABOTAGING the AI. The AI will try to HARVEST pieces of art to put it in the Algorithm grinder and deliver the prompt (each prompt required a specific amount of piece).

Save humanity, save the artists, defeat the AI!

Credits: Paci (Design, Code, Art) & Vicious (Design, Sound, Music)

Tips: 

  • Stay in the artist creative area to help her complete the original piece asap Rush through the delivery area when you have the package before the AI can finish it’s part. 
  • Make the mechanical arm grab shit art doesn’t stop the AI completing the prompt, but it does give you poll points. 
  • Try dashing through the pieces of art on your way to disturb the mechanical grab. 
  • The poll IS LIKE YOUR HEALTH. Perform better than the AI and you’ll gain people’s hearts!
